titulo: Increasing competitiveness and resilience of multimodal freight transport and logistics for competitive supply chains
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all the following expected outcomes:Advanced tools and solutions are developed and demonstrated to enhance the competitiveness of European multimodal freight transport networks, ensuring sustainability, resilience, security and increased freight transport capacity;Solutions provide real-time visibility, tracking and predictive analytics for multimodal services, performance, and network status (e.g., disruptions, maintenance) to suppo
